description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Chroniques du Château de Gironville, extraites [by G.] de la Chronique Latine de Turpin, de la Chronique Arabe de Ben-Thamar, et d'un Poème Norvégien du neuvième siècle. Illustrations de J. A. Beaucé, gravures de Pisan" Contributor: BEAUCÉ, Jean Adolphe. Contributor: BIARNEZ, P. Contributor: PISAN, H. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10172.g.12." Page: 58 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1854 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001431690 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
